data.description: Perl/Tk widget set for editing MARC::Records
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Hmm. Well, it's a Perl/Tk widget set for editing MARC::Record
    objects. It implements the following widgets: Tk::MARC::Record
    Tk::MARC::Field Tk::MARC::Subfield Tk::MARC::Indicators
    Tk::MARC::Leader and uses MARC::Record and MARC::Descriptions. I
    though putting it under Tk:: would fit well with other Tk:: widgets.
    I suspect there will opportunities to create other Tk:: widgets for
    other MARC:: objects.
